info.title: Order Management
info.description: The Walmart Order Management APIs help Sellers to manage customer’s Sales Orders and to stay up-to-date on orders fulfillment, which orders to fulfill, and when to fulfill them.

post.description: Updates the status of order lines to Shipped and trigger the charge to the customer. The response to a successful call contains the order with the shipped line items.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: purchaseOrderId

shipments.description: List of shipments associated with the order

primeLineNo.description: The number to identify the associated order line for the shipment line. Example: 'primeLineNo=1 means the shipment line is associated with orderLine having primeLineNumber=1'

shipmentLineNo.description: The unique number for the shipment line in a given shipment

unitOfMeasurement.description: The associated quantity unit of measure

quantity.description: The quantity associated with the shipment line

carrier.description:
The package shipment carrier. Valid entries are: MX-FEDX, MX-DHL, Estafeta, SFC, Other.
if carrier is (MX-FEDX or MX-DHL or Estafeta or SFC)
    then trackingNumber is Mandatory
if carrier is Other
    then both trackingNumber & trackingURL is Mandatory

items.description: List of shipments associated with the order

post.description: Updates the status of order lines to Delivered. The response to a successful call returns 200 Status Code.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: purchaseOrderId

post.description: You can cancel one or more order lines. You must include a purchaseOrderId when cancelling an order line. The response to a successful call contains the order with the cancelled line items

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: purchaseOrderId

post.description: You can use this API to acknowledge an entire order, including all of its order lines. The response to a successful call contains the acknowledged order.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: purchaseOrderId

post.description: Get Shipping Label in bulk for multiple tracking numbers in zip/pdf file

parameters.name: FORMAT
parameters.description: format in which you want to download bulk labels, expected values are ZIP/ PDF only

requestBody.description: Request body with list of tracking numbers

get.description: Retrieves the details of all the orders for specified search criteria. The same API can be used to search a single order based on purchaseOrderId/ customerOrderId This API supports only upto an offset of 1000 in response with max limit 100 orders. You can use cursor based API instead to get all the orders.

parameters.name: createdStartDate
parameters.description: Start Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Use epoch time format in seconds.

parameters.name: createdEndDate
parameters.description: End Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Use epoch time format in seconds.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of orders to be returned. Cannot be greater than 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the first order required in the response. Cannot be greater than 1000

parameters.name: customerOrderId
parameters.description: The customer order ID.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: The purchase order ID.

parameters.name: statusCodeFilter
parameters.description: The status code filter to apply. Valid values will be Created, Acknowledged, Shipped, Cancelled, OnHold, Delivered.

item.productName: Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A51, 128GB/4GB RAM Negro Desbloquead
JUEGO DE CUBIERTOS 20 PZS ACERO INOX PULIDO EMPAQUETADO

get.description: Retrieves the details of all the WFS orders for specified search criteria.

parameters.name: createdStartDate
parameters.description: Start Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Use epoch time format in seconds.

parameters.name: createdEndDate
parameters.description: End Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Use epoch time format in seconds.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of orders to be returned. Cannot be larger than 200.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the first order required in the response.

parameters.name: customerOrderId
parameters.description: The customer order ID.

parameters.name: statusCodeFilter
parameters.description: The status code filter to apply. Valid values will be Created, SentForFulfillment, Shipped, Cancelled, Delivered

postalAddress.name: Alan Catana Hernández
postalAddress.address6: Casa a lado de una capilla

get.description: Get Shipping Label in PNG format

parameters.name: trackingNumber
parameters.description: trackingNumber

get.summary: Get all orders using cursor mark
get.description: Retrieves the details of all the orders for specified search criteria. The same API can be used to search a single order based on purchaseOrderId/ customerOrderId With this API you can get all orders in response, it returns nextCursorMark for the next 100 orders so on and so forth upto the last order

parameters.name: createdStartDate
parameters.description: Start Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Either both the createdStartDate, createdEndDate must be present in the query params or none present. If passed must be in the format - 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX' (Ex. 2022-01-29T10:53:12.355-09:30 ). Use URI encoded time format.

parameters.name: createdEndDate
parameters.description: End Date for querying all purchase orders after this date. Either both the createdStartDate, createdEndDate must be present in the query params or none present. If passed must be in the format - 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX' (Ex. 2022-03-29T16:43:12.355+05:30 ). Use URI encoded time format.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of orders to be returned. Cannot be larger than 100.

parameters.name: cursorMark
parameters.description: The cursor from which next set of records to be retrieved.

parameters.name: customerOrderId
parameters.description: The customer order ID.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: The purchase order ID.

parameters.name: statusCodeFilter
parameters.description: The status code filter to apply. Valid values will be Created, Acknowledged, Shipped, Cancelled, OnHold, Delivered.

items.description: List of shipments associated with the order

purchaseOrderNo.description: A unique ID associated with the seller's purchase order

eventTime.description: Time at which the order was delivered

eventName.description: Type of Order Event. Valid entry is DELIVERY_UPDATE

packageNo.description: Package number associated with the orderline

BillingInfo.description: The shipping information provided by the customer to the seller

currency.description: The type of currency for the charge.Example: 'MXN for Mexico Pesos'

amount.description: The numerical amount for that charge

Commission.description: The commission that Walmart will charge seller for the item

upc.description: Unique product code of the product associated with the line item

productName.description: The name of the product associated with the line item

sku.description: The sku id the seller maintains at their end

unitOfMeasurement.description: The unit with which the orderLine is measured

amount.description: The amount with witch the orderLine is measured along with unitofMeasurement

purchaseOrderId.description: A unique ID associated with the seller's purchase order

customerOrderId.description: A unique ID associated with the sales order for specified customer

customerEmailId.description: The email address of the customer for the sales order

orderDate.description: The date the customer submitted the sales order

totalLines.description: Total number of order lines in the order

totalQuantity.description: Total number of items in all order lines in the order

orderLines.description: A list of order lines in the order

shipments.description: List of shipments associated with the order

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used to pay for the order

OrderLine.description: A list of order lines in the order

currency.description: The type of currency for the charge.Example: 'MXN for Mexico Pesos'

amount.description: The numerical amount for that charge

OrderTotal.description: This value represents the order total without charges. OrderTotal = Unit Price * Quantity

address1.description: The first line of the shipping address

address2.description: The second line of the shipping address

city.description: The city of the shipping address

state.description: The state of the shipping address

postalCode.description: The zip code of the shipping address

country.description: The country of the shipping address

PostalAddress.description: Elements of the customer's postal address

Shipment.description: List of shipments associated with the order

ShippingInfo.description: The shipping information provided by the customer to the seller

currency.description: The type of currency for the charge.Example: 'MXN for Mexico Pesos'

amount.description: The numerical amount for that charge

UnitPrice.description: The price associated with the single quantity of the line item with tax

currency.description: The type of currency for the charge.Example: 'MXN for Mexico Pesos'

amount.description: The numerical amount for that charge

UnitPriceWithoutTax.description: The price associated with the single quantity of the line item without tax

authorization.name: Authorization
authorization.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.

accessToken.name: WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN
accessToken.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

channelType.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
channelType.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

correlationId.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
correlationId.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID
